span.p: This 1U component resides in systrem bay 1 and is at the heart of the EMC Dynamic Virtual Matrix(TM) architecture. It enables communication and resource sharing in multi-engine 400K arrays. The IB interconnect includes the following components

ul.li: 2 1Gb Ethernet RJ-45 management ports (connections to Ethernet switches A and B)

span.p: Each engine provides redundant interfaces to the IB interconnect.
